step_feedback.feedback: For step 1, try to keep your arm straighter overhead and feel that gentle resistance. Your shoulder and wrist alignment can be improved.
For step 2, focus on opening your palm and fingers wide. Ensure your wrist is also open and extended.
For step 3, make a tight fist while inhaling, squeezing your muscles. Your wrist and elbow could be tighter.
For step 4, relax your hand and muscles as you exhale. Try to relax your elbow and wrist more fully.

exercise_summary: Great job with the overhead pumping! Remember to stretch your arm straight overhead and really feel the resistance. Open your hand wide, then make a tight fist as you breathe in, and relax as you breathe out. Keep practicing this to help with fluid flow.
